idea:
Iramai Advance Systems proposes to help our clients and partners through our team's experience, vision & forward-thinking “System Integration Solutions and Services”.

Our focus is on client organizations working in the field of Sustainable Green Energy, Government Departments, Banking Sector, Manufacturing Industry, Telecom Sector, Data Center Service Providers, Enterprise Business and large Shopping Malls.
name: Iramai Advance Systems Pvt. Ltd.

idea:
The Happy Place is an AI & machine learning powered – content driven app tailored to bring a smile to your face.

The app figures out your likes, dislikes, and preferences and uses our endless content (50,000 pieces of content and more getting added as we speak) in the form of literally anything (Photos, videos, GIFs, audios, etc) to make sure that you have a smile on your face in the lowest amount of time possible.

Our average smile wait time feature gives you the average amount of time that the app will take to bring you your first smile, and that time will keep reducing as you keep using the app and the app keeps knowing you.

It is the one-stop solution to anyone feeling low, anytime, anywhere.

We are trying to solve today's biggest problem, mental health with today's biggest passion, entertainment.
name: Happy Place App Private Limited
